title: Oshikake Twin Tail
description: A reliable JK and a beautiful mother. Toshiro Nitta is a Hikikomori who happens to be a trader. He lives alone in a large Japanese house as a shut-in. One day,  some of his relatives have to start living with him ... !!  The life of a heart-pounding harassing life begins!

matches.title: The Exorcist and the Collared Demon
Maou no Kawaii Yamada wa Yoiko
